accountSharing.blocked: Multiple people are using Dotabod GSI files for this stream. Account "{{accountName}}" is blocked. Use !clearsharing to reset, but ensure only one person has the GSI file.

betaTester_off: nu este disponibil pentru un tester de incercare. Scrie !beta pentru a te alatura din nou
betaTester_on: {{channel}} este acum un beta tester. Vizitați discord.dotabod.com pentru a vedea caracteristicile beta. Tastați !beta pentru a anula

bets.cannotResolveCurrentMatch: Cannot resolve the current ongoing match. Wait for the game to end or use !won / !lost without a match ID for pending resolutions.
bets.lost: Am pierdut, gg nt {{emote}} mergem mai departe
bets.manualResolution: Disconnected before the match ended. Mods, use !won or !lost to resolve the bet manually and count the WL {{emote}}
bets.manualResolutionExpired: Previous match bet expired and was refunded (mods not doing their jobs, next time use !won or !lost) {{emote}}
bets.manualResolutionSuccess_lost: Bet manually resolved as LOST by @{{username}}
bets.manualResolutionSuccess_won: Bet manually resolved as WON by @{{username}}
bets.notScored: Potrivire fără scor {{emote}} Nu se adaugă sau nu se elimină MMR pentru acest meci {{matchId}}.
bets.remade: Eroul a fost schimbat {{emote}} Pariurile pentru {{- oldHeroName}} au fost rambursate o noua sesiune de pariat pentru {{- newHeroName}} este deschisa {{emote2}}
bets.retroactiveMatchExpired: Match {{matchId}} is too old to resolve (must be from current stream) {{emote}}
bets.retroactiveMatchNotFound: Match {{matchId}} not found or already resolved {{emote}}
bets.retroactiveResolutionSuccess_lost: Match {{matchId}} manually marked as LOST by @{{username}}
bets.retroactiveResolutionSuccess_won: Match {{matchId}} manually marked as WON by @{{username}}
bets.unresolvedMatches: {{count}} unresolved match(es) {{emote}} Use !won or !lost with match ID: {{matchList}}

chatters.pause: Cine a pus pauza la joc?
chatters.tpFound: {{channel}} treabă frumoasă în cele din urmă să obții un tp după $t(secunde, {"count": {{seconds}} }) {{emote}}
chatters.tpFromDeath: Datorită acestui deces ai primit în sfârșit un tp. Și a fost nevoie doar de $t(secunde, {"count": {{seconds}} }) {{emote}}

chattersRankUnknown: @{{username}}'s rank is unknown. Become Dotabod verified to get your rank! {{- url}}

clearsharing.error: Failed to clear account sharing. Please try again or contact support.
clearsharing.success: Account sharing reset successfully. Multiple Steam accounts can now send GSI data again. WARNING: Make sure only one person has the Dotabod GSI config file, or conflicts will reoccur.

commandDisabled: The streamer has disabled the {{cmdName}} command {{emote}}. Please check !commands for the list of available commands.
commandsPage: To view {{- channel}}'s commands, visit {{- url}}
dota2pt: Need pro build ideas for {{- heroName}}? Check here {{- url}}
dotabod: I'm an open source bot made by {{author}}. More info: {{- url}}

dotapatch.newPatch: {{emote}} A new Dota 2 patch has been released: {{version}}. Check out the patch notes at https://www.dota2.com/patches

facetNotFound: Use !facet {{- heroName}} 1 or !facet {{- heroName}} 2 · Dotabod only knows the streamer's facet
facetTotalLimit_one: Only {{count}} facet is available for {{- heroName}} · $t(facetNotFound, {{- heroName }})
facetTotalLimit_few: Only {{count}} facets are available for {{- heroName}} · $t(facetNotFound, {{- heroName }})
facetTotalLimit_other: Only {{count}} facets are available for {{- heroName}} · $t(facetNotFound, {{- heroName }})
giftSub: A gift sub for Dotabod Pro was just gifted by {{- senderName}}!
giftSubAnonymous: A gift sub for Dotabod Pro was just gifted anonymously!
gpm_one: Live GPM for {{- heroName}}: {{num}}. {{heroKills}} from hero kills, {{creepKills}} from creep kills.
gpm_few: Live GPM for {{- heroName}}: {{num}}. {{heroKills}} from hero kills, {{creepKills}} from creep kills.
gpm_other: Live GPM for {{- heroName}}: {{num}}. {{heroKills}} from hero kills, {{creepKills}} from creep kills.

heroItems.empty: (2m delay) No items found for {{- heroName}}

herostats.noneColor: {{color}} has no matches played as {{- heroName}} {{timeperiod}}
herostats.winrateColor_one: {{color}}'s winrate is {{winrate}}% on {{- heroName}} {{timeperiod}} from {{count}} match.
herostats.winrateColor_few: {{color}}'s winrate is {{winrate}}% on {{- heroName}} {{timeperiod}} from {{count}} matches.
herostats.winrateColor_other: {{color}}'s winrate is {{winrate}}% on {{- heroName}} {{timeperiod}} from {{count}} matches.

herostats.winrateStreamer_other: Winrate is {{winrate}}% on {{- heroName}} {{timeperiod}} from {{count}} matches.

heroStats: {{- heroName}}: KDA {{- kda}} · LH {{lasthits}} · DN {{denies}} · G {{gold}} · NW {{net_worth}} · LVL {{level}}
invalidColor: Invalid hero color, slot, or name. Try 1-10, a partial hero name, or a color from {{colorList}}
invalidColorNew: Invalid command. Try `!{{command}} crystal maiden` or `!{{command}} 9` or `!{{command}} teal` from {{colorList}}
invalidHero: Invalid hero specified. Try `!{{command}} x` from {{heroList}}
lastFmNotConfigured: Last.fm username is not configured. The streamer needs to set it up in the Dotabod dashboard.

lastgame.none: Not playing with anyone from last game
lastgame.total_few: Playing with {{count}} players from last game.
lastgame.total_other: Playing with {{count}} players from last game.

matchData8500: Valve disabled data for 8500+ mmr matches
matchDataValveDisabled: On Oct 9, 2025, Valve disabled player data in live matches.
missingUser: User not found. Try logging out and in of dotabod.com
modsOnly_off: Mods only mode is now off. Everyone can type.
modsOnly_on: Mods only mode is now on {{emote}} . Only mods can type.
multiAccount: This steam account is already connected to another Dotabod user. Check dashboard for more info {{- url}}
muted: Will no longer auto chat on game events, but will still respond to commands. Type !unmute to undo

neutralItems.tierAvailable: Tier {{tier}} neutral items are now available! Time to check the jungle PogChamp

noLastMatch: Did not find a last match {{emote}}
notLive: Stream nu live {{emote}} . De fapt live? Scrie comanda l!online
npUnknown: Nu am putut găsi {{steamid}} pentru acest canal
overlayMissing: Overlay nu a fost găsit. Comanda {{command}} necesită suprapunerea pentru a fi adăugată.
plebSubRequired: !pleb command can only be used if sub only mode is enabled.
privateProfile: Profilul stream-ului este privat. Comanda {{command}} folosește OpenDota și le cere să activeze 'Expune Date despre Meciul Public' în setările lor Dota.
ranked_no: Nu se pare că acest joc nu este ranked
rankOnlyDisabled: Verified mode is now disabled. Everyone can chat.
rankOnlyEnabled: Verified mode is now enabled. Only {{rank}} or higher ranks can chat. Visit {{- url}} to become Dotabod verified.
rankOnlyMode: @{{name}} - Your message was deleted because this channel is in verified mode ({{requiredRank}}+ only). Visit {{- url}} to become Dotabod verified.
rankOnlyStatus_enabled: Verified mode is currently enabled. Only {{rank}}+ ranks can chat. Visit {{- url}} to become Dotabod verified.
refreshToken: Contul tau de Twitch trebuie sa fie reconectat la DotaBod. {{channel}} delogare si logare pe dotabod.com pentru a rezolva.

roshanCount.1: Roshan prima ucidere. Urmatorul drop cheese.
roshanCount.2: Roshan a-2a ucidere, Urmatorul drop chesse/banner.
roshanCount.3: Roshan a-3a ucidere. Urmatorul drop refresher,aghanim blessing.
roshanCount.more_one: Rosh deaths: {{count}} · Next drop: cheese, agh's blessing or refresher shard.
roshanCount.more_few: Rosh deaths: {{count}} · Next drop: cheese, agh's blessing or refresher shard.
roshanCount.more_other: Rosh deaths: {{count}} · Next drop: cheese, agh's blessing or refresher shard.

roshanKilled: Roshan killed! Next roshan between {{min}} and {{max}}
songError: Error fetching song information from Last.fm.

spectators.count_none: No spectators currently watching this match live

stream_none: No changes made, user already {{state}}. Try !{{command}} to toggle.
stream_off: Dotabod will treat {{channel}} as offline. Type !online to undo
stream_on: Dotabod will treat {{channel}} as online. Type !offline to undo
streamDelayNone: There is no stream delay on this channel
subscriptionRequired: ✨ Unlock this command and more features with Dotabod Pro. Visit dotabod.com to subscribe or dotabod.com/{{channel}}/gift to gift your streamer a sub!
toggle_disabled: Dotabod is now disabled. Will no longer respond to commands nor watch game events. Type !toggle again to enable.
toggle_enabled: Dotabod is now enabled. Responding to commands again and watching game events. Type !toggle again to disable.
toggleMatch_double: Changing this match to double down mmr: {{- url}} Type !fixdd to undo
toggleMatch_party: Changing this match to party mmr: {{- url}} Type !fixparty to undo
toggleMatch_single: Changing this match to single down mmr: {{- url}} Type !fixdd to undo
toggleMatch_solo: Changing this match to solo mmr: {{- url}} Type !fixparty to undo

translated.by_one: Dotabod is translated by {{- translators}}. Want to help translate or see a mistake? {{- url}}
translated.by_few: Dotabod is translated by {{- translators}}. Want to help translate or see a mistake? {{- url}}
translated.by_other: Dotabod is translated by {{- translators}}. Want to help translate or see a mistake? {{- url}}

treadToggle_one: We toggled treads {{count}} time to save a total {{manaCount}} mana this match.
treadToggle_few: We toggled treads {{count}} times to save a total {{manaCount}} mana this match.
treadToggle_other: We toggled treads {{count}} times to save a total {{manaCount}} mana this match.
uknownMmr: I don't know {{channel}}'s MMR yet. Mods have to !setmmr 1234 or set it in {{- url}}
unknownSteam: Could not find steam account. Follow Step 2 of setup, play a bot match, and try again.
unmuted: Will now auto chat on game events. Type !mute to undo
updateMmrMulti: Multiple steam accounts, updating the one you are currently logged in with ({{steamId}})
updateMmrNoChange: MMR already {{mmr}}, no change was made

version.commit: Server running version {{version}}, here's what's missing compared to the latest version: {{- url}}
version.unknown: Couldn't find the last git commit, here's the repo {{- url}}

winprobability.winProbabilityDataNotAvailable: Win probability is not available yet · Try again in {{remainingCooldown}}s
